frontmatter.description: Utilize the time effectively by taking swings in areas that look like potential opportunities. Make the swings worthwhile, and go after the right opportunities.
frontmatter.title: Bigger strides

frontmatter.description: It's easy to lose focus and become distracted. Real changes have occurred, causing plans to change. Adjust, reassess, then focus on the task at hand.
frontmatter.title: Task at hand

frontmatter.description: smoky late summer. interrupts outdoor escapes. oh, the pandemic.
frontmatter.title: Smoky conditions during a pandemic

frontmatter.description: Marketplaces should not be for the benefit of one. Find the best qualities of real world marketplaces, then bring those online. Digital commerce is still in early innings.
frontmatter.title: Bringing Main Street online

frontmatter.description: Think of cars as cows, wandering about with their own purpose. The cows don't think about the people around them before moving. There's no sense getting angry at cows either; they won't even undestand the problem. Get around the cows and be ready for them to act in unexpected ways.
frontmatter.title: Cows don't realize their mistakes

frontmatter.description: Give people a reason to notice and make it exceedingly clear. Don't expect people to notice a different arrangement of the same spots.
frontmatter.title: Purple cows turn heads

frontmatter.description: Stretch beyond the boundaries currently in place. Overcome limitations with additional resources. Look further than the current conditions make readily apparent.
frontmatter.title: Further than currently possible

frontmatter.description: Make better things. Do better work. Demonstrate the possibilities.
frontmatter.title: Create projects too good to ignore

frontmatter.description: Physical activity brings many benefits to moods, outlooks, and physical health. Develop routines to stay active indoors with the kids. Don't fall into a pattern of waiting for the right conditions to get moving again.
frontmatter.title: Staying active inside during the pandemic

frontmatter.description: Put effort into solutions that get better over time, and don't depend on manual maintenance.
frontmatter.title: Digital solutions get better over time
